entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
